Author: LabelsCoin
Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: LabelsCoin™ Whitepaper Roadmap Telegram Channel Legal Telegram Group Github Reddit Twitter Facebook Team Bounty Thread Instagram Youtube  LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights  LabelsCoin Establishment’s vision and future business model and strategy are made up of three components: (i) a digital currency, (ii) an online music recognition system providing real time royalties to music stakeholders and (iii) a patented industrial device. creation of a digital currency, called LabelsCoin (LBSC). LBSC will be may be used to remunerate stakeholders within the LabelsCoin ecosystem, such as expected for the future. However, LBSC will be independent of LabelsCoin Establishment’s products and services. LBSC may be used to buy and sell any goods or services but also to store value, like any other digital currency on the market.  LabelsCoin™  blockchain  is an automated music  copyrights exchange blockchain technology  with associated suite of services. Combined, these facilitate the transparency of copyrights and the exchange of associated royalties  – allowing for a fair and transparent retribution to creators of music.  LabelsCoin  blockchain is built on top of a copyright matching engine that  verifies the status of a music against it license model , infringements, plagiarisms and redistribution rights and means.  However, in order to protect our contributors we have patented and industrial device  which at the moment is under production and will be available on the market within 2019.  LabelsCoin vision:  create awareness of the royalties redistribution issues, providing solution for  positive change.  LabelsCoin goal:  is building a solid, global music utility,  finalising our advanced blockchain that the entire Music industry will use to create advantage, where all stakeholders can partecipate in a fair way.  Features  • IMMUTABILITY: once created, the copyright blockchain representation  cannot be delete yet ownership can be transmitted • REAL TIME: royalties payment • TRANSPARENT: owners and fees are transparent • AUTOMATION:  music copyrights execution   White Paper : https://www.labelscoin.io/LABELSCOIN_WH_v0.5.pdf  Token information  Etherscan Smartcontract info: https://etherscan.io/token/0x44f70b3f2938dee203360f6fa2c11e7b59cf4c71  TOKEN NAME: LBSC  COIN TYPE: ERC-20 Token ( Compatible with MyEtherWallet etc..)     ROADMAP  • November 2017 end market research, white paper 0.1 version, legal advice, build a team • March 2018 LabelsCoin website and LBSC token creation, update white paper 0.2 • April 2018 Patent of device and first meeting with  Financial Market Authority of Liechtenstein, update white paper 0.3 • May 2018 Genesis of LabelsCoin blockchain: update white paper 0.4 • June 2018 Development of LabelsCoin  blockchain, meet up conference Montreux Palace (Switzerland) press conference in Venafro, Italy • July 2018 Legal advice of LBSC token, LabelsCoin officially International Trademark • August 2018, Second meeting with Financial Market Authority of Liechtenstein, incorporation of  KYC in our website, development of blockchain, meet up with Swiss Cyber Security in Geneva, Switzerland, update 0.5 • September 2018 PRE-ICO, 33.4% of the token will be on pre-sale  to determine the price of the ICO • November 2018 INITIAL COIN OFFERING, the 40% of tokens will be distributed • December 2018 End of ICO     PRE-ICO  Click to contribute now.  https://www.labelscoin.io

Author: hashcoin
Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: LabelsCoin blockchain is built on copyright matching machines that verify everything related to music making. How does the system work?

Author: LabelsCoin
Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: We have already a bounty manager. Thanks for your interest.  Quote from: hashcoin on September 10, 2018, 12:54:16 AM LabelsCoin blockchain is built on copyright matching machines that verify everything related to music making. How does the system work? LabelsCoin Establishment is in a contractual relationship with the Online platform and the Musician. An online platform user uploads illegally the Musician’s music. Thanks to the blockchain, the music will be recognized as being played illegally and the Online platform will be warned, in order to recourse against the Online platform user (and block the illegal upload). LabelsCoin Establishment is in a contractual relationship with the Online platform and the Musician. An online platform user listens to the Musician’s music. Thanks to the blockchain, the music will be recognized as being played and the royalties will automatically be paid by the Online platform to the Musician (another stakeholders).

Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: We are happy to announce that we will publish our bounty Campaign tomorrow. Thanks for being with us.

Author: Krezz2017
Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: You wrote. "We have a patented and industrial device that is currently in production and will be available on the market during 2019." But, in addition to the fact that the database of your device should be stored in the database of identities, it must also be universally recognized.

Author: margoslend
Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: absurd idea. Agree first with the supply and demand. It has long been proven that music should be popular, and not be somewhere there in the archives and wait for money from downloading its users. The best method of distribution is not a license, but any free version and blockchain is not an option here. The option that you offer, it is possible to apply to the store selling music records, but I think fame as an artist is more important for the authors.

Author: LabelsCoin
Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: Dear Margoslend, thank you for your message. Perhaps, you are not from music industry and that's why you believe that fame is more important than revenue. Kindly note, that singers, musicians and songwriters are real jobs! However, is not all about notoriety, there are many unknown artists which they live with the royalties they received every 3 months or at the end of the year or some of them unfortunately  do not receive nothing. So it is important to have a  transparent royalties distribution, to make the music industry fair for the entire ecosystem. Can you imagine if all of us  adopt the option of free music download? We will have the worst scenario ever! Artists will starving and the music industry will collapse dramatically. We have to support legal download to protect people who invest and work for music industry.

Author: margoslend
Title: LabelsCoin™ - The Blockchain of Music Copyrights
Body: that is, in your opinion, it turns out to put creativity on the accounting and reporting system?? All those who are talented, creates his paintings, plays, music, etc.not for money, it is secondary. First of all, it is a surge of emotions, a spontaneous idea, but not an ordinary job for pennies. The money comes from custom work, but it's not creativity, it's simple work.   Perhaps all the authors listed by you can exist on the finances of patrons ,but the blockchain without need
